Articles.Content: It\'s been 10 days since the release of 0.16, i\'m curious to know if Squad is working on a 0.161 patch, or is working on 0.17.
Usually a short break before working on the patches and next updates, there are a few bugs so a 0.16.1 might make sense as coming next.
I\'m assuming 10 days is long enough for a short break, and while i agree that a patch would make sense, i\'d like confirmation from the people who know.

I\'m assuming 10 days is long enough for a short break, and while i agree that a patch would make sense, i\'d like confirmation from the people who know.

They\'ll say what\'s coming next when they\'re ready to say what\'s next. Squad isn\'t a massive developing franchise, they\'re a small but dedicated group. Play and enjoy the current version, and rest assured that whenever we get the next version that it will be another quality release.

You will know when everyone else does as Harv will make a post about it. Until then, no one knows anything and asking this question just irritates the community. It\'s the equivalent of a little kid in the back seat of the car yelling 'Are we there yet? Are we there yet? Are we there yet?'

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
